item.description:
Learn some of the advanced levels of the Enneagram through understanding the wings, instinctual subtypes within your type and how that connects to other type parts of yourself. We'll touch on some of the relationship dynamics between types. Don't miss this important event that will take you well beyond the basics.

Optional macrobiotic meal for an additional $20 by chef David Snieckus from 7 to 8:30pm. Need 1 day advanced notice.

Herb Pearce, M.Ed. in Counseling, is a leading teacher of the Enneagram, having taught thousands of workshops in his 30 plus years of teaching. He is the author of The Idiot's Guide to the Enneagram which you can purchase from him, as well as his new ebook, Herb's Tips for Living at www.herbstipsforliving.com. He is a relationship therapist and coach and does phone counseling at 781 648 3737. www.herbpearce.com, herb@herbpearce.com.
item.how_to_find_us: Email me to get exact directions
item.why: You want to go to the next level of the Enneagram in understanding yourself and other people
item.name: Enneagram Subtypes in Newton, MA
